Temporarily deactivate your account. Easily reactivate when you\'re ready.
Permanently remove your account and data proceed with caution
The app collect user-provided information during account creation and adoption applications.
User data is used for improving app services.
Limited information is shared with shelters during adoption applications.
This app employs security measures to protect user data.
BY using app, users accept and agree to these terms of services.
Users must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use this app.
Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account.
Users agree not to engage in harmful activities. Including unauthorized access or data manipulation.
